name: NOTE_COPY_TRACKING
description: Track the source note information that this note was copied from.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTE_COPY_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant (UTC) when this note was copied.

columns.name: NOTE_COPY_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when this note was copied.
